text: Arra wa, yogen-sha to kunan no toki ni kare ni shitagatta sen'i-sha-tachi 〔muhajirun〕 to enjo-sha-tachi 〔ansaru〕 ni awaremi o kake rareta. Sonogo kare-ra no ichibu no mono no kokoro wa,(sono gimu no riko kara) hotondo sorete shimatta. Sonotoki kare hakare-ra ni, awaremi o kake rareta. Hontoni kare wa, kare-ra (musurimu) ni shinsetsudeari jihibukaku ara reru
